name: Grow Up (itch) (CozySunrise, BigAwesome)
description:
Participation in Spring 2D Jam 2022 by Theo Clarke

In this game you start as a little seed underground.

With a click above the seed you can grow a trunk and expand  your tree. As soon as you reached the surface you can grow branches next to it. Wich will turn into beautiful leaves after a while.

To gather grow-power you also need to expand through the ground with your roots to find water sources.

Watch out for all the other plants in your yard. They might not be the smartest but they can take your space.

Controls:
  • Right-click: Move the camera
  • Left-click:
    • Place a trunk: Click above or diagoal of a seed or the last placed trunk to place a new trunk
    • Place a branch: On the surface level click next to any trunk or branch
    • Place a root: Click on field below the seed that has at least one root or the seed above it
Goal:
  • Each level has a amount of tree fields and leaves that you need to have to get to the next season
  • With a new season you get a new seed you controll
  • If the grow-power is empty or the season timer is over and the conditions are not fulfilled the season is lost
  • When there are no seeds to controll left the game is over
